Location: 2 miles south of the Point Reyes National Seashore, in Marin County, California
Description: The reported environmental violation involves illegal drum dumping in a protected marine area along the west coast of the USA. The violation was discovered by a local fisherman who noticed several barrels containing hazardous chemicals washed up on the shore near his fishing grounds. The barrels were found to contain toxic waste from an industrial facility, which poses a significant threat to the local marine ecosystem and the health of the surrounding communities. The responsible party is currently unknown, and authorities are conducting an investigation to identify the source of the illegal dumping and hold the perpetrators accountable for their actions.
